title: Minecraft多人游戏求助
author: Geehonly
txt_content:
一打开多人游戏就闪退。。
错误报告：
Completely ignored arguments: [--nativeLauncherVersion, 1393, --nativeLauncherVersion, 1549]
[11:58:26] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: Geehonly
[11:58:28] [Client thread/WARN]: Skipping bad option: lastServer:
[11:58:28] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
[11:58:28] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default
[11:58:29] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...
[11:58:29] [Thread-3/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
[11:58:29] [Thread-3/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)
[11:58:30] [Thread-3/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[11:58:30] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[11:58:34] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures-atlas
[11:58:37] [Client thread/ERROR]: ########## GL ERROR ##########
[11:58:37] [Client thread/ERROR]: @ Post startup
[11:58:37] [Client thread/ERROR]: 1281: Invalid value
[11:58:37] [Client thread/INFO]: Narrator library for x86 successfully loaded
[11:58:38] [Client thread/ERROR]: ########## GL ERROR ##########
[11:58:38] [Client thread/ERROR]: @ Pre render
[11:58:38] [Client thread/ERROR]: 1281: Invalid value
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x32f8161b, pid=3532, tid=3936
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_51-b16) (build 1.8.0_51-b16)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (25.51-b03 mixed mode windows-x86 )
# Problematic frame:
# C  [LonlifeLSP.dll+0x161b]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\hs_err_pid3532.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release


dalao们帮忙看看QAQ

replies.txt_content:
尝试在玲珑加速器排除java以及minecraft，或者卸载该加速器并重置lsp
参考来源
解决情况未知：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-522766-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-732935-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-780674-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-788859-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-801460-1-1.htmlhttps://forum.warthunder.com/index.php?/topic/402005-cannot-open-launcher/
疑似解决成功：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-782677-1-1.htmlhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-792695-1-1.html

replies.author: nja2106820
replies.txt_content:
allib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1设备未关闭

Java HotSpot(TM)客户端VM警告:不赞成使用增量CMS，在将来的版本中可能会被删除

更换客户端

replies.txt_content:

Minecraft正版怎么破？
问题是盗版客户端问题一样的啊0.0

replies.author: Geehonly
replies.txt_content:
a6809936 发表于 2018-7-3 12:05
尝试在玲珑加速器排除java以及minecraft，或者卸载该加速器并重置lsp
参考来源
真心谢谢，不是加速器，是lsp污染错误。刚刚重启了电脑就都ok了
